text:
You can't keep up with AI. Me neither.

Here's what we must do instead:

1. Pick your battle.
☑ Pick one AI. A good start is ChatGPT.
☑ Pick one task. A good start is writing [X] better.

2. Play with it.
☑ Try different prompts (= requests).
☑ Try different models (gpt-4o, o3, gpt-4.5).
☑ Try different features (Canvas, Deep Research).

For eg. "Here's a good copy of [X]. Now help me write a new copy of [X], but considering [Y]."

3. Lower your expectations.
☑ It is not god or an almighty intelligence.
☑ It is a tool to do [X] better, faster, with taste.

4. Finally, upgrade your expectations.
☑ Now that you mastered one AI, connect them.
☑ One can search. Another can generate an image.
☑ Follow the "pick one AI → play → iterate" pattern.

5. Take your time.
☑ Technology goes fast. But people go slower.
☑ Save this post for later when you open ChatGPT.
☑ Go to the top right → three dots → "Save" post.
